contextId.information: It would be a wonderful thing to see the woman dancing with the other dancers. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_hypo]])
contextId.quote: as if I were dancing between two rows of dancers

contextId.information: "Even if a man ... he would be utterly despised." (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_hypo]])
contextId.quote: If a man gave ... the offer would utterly be despised
